气候变化正在提高肾脏疾病和泌尿科癌症的速度气候变化正在增加泌尿外科疾病（包括癌症和肾脏状况）的风险，而泌尿外科医疗保健本身通过高碳排放造成了环境伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/climate-change-is-pushing-up-rates-up-rates-of-kidney-disease-disease-and-erological-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/climate-change-is-pushing-up-rates-up-rates-of-kidney-disease-and-yasease-and-urological-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58862f2B-EF4C-4026-968F-7D05E2999595B Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:39:00 -0500 Climate change is pushing up rates of kidney disease and urological cancers
研究揭示了神经胶质细胞如何响应神经元树突的损伤神经元可能会获得所有的荣耀，但是如果没有神经胶质细胞，它们将一无所获。尽管脑细胞在神经系统中进行繁重的升高，但正是神经胶质可提供营养，清理废物并保护神经元免受伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-reveals-how-glial-cell-cells-respond-respond-to-damage-in-neuron-neuron dendrites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-reveals-how-glial-cell-cell-cells-respond-to-to-damage-in-neuron dendrites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A8C6CE3-4A1F-4E94-9AC9-812B6DD1763B Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:37:57 -0500 Study reveals how glial cells respond to damage in neuron dendrites

新工具早日检测高度可传播的SARS-COV-2变体研究人员开发了一个强大的工具，可以检测SARS-COV-2的变体具有很高的传输潜力，然后它们才能广泛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-tool-detects-highly-transmissible-sars-sars-cov-2-variants-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/new-tool-detects-highly-transmissible-sars-sars-cov-2-variants-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fbf8bb1-95bf-45bf-45df-a59e-f6a67361d590 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:29:15 -0500 New tool detects highly transmissible SARS-CoV-2 variants early
高速在线力映射揭开大肠杆菌细胞分裂动力学光和电子显微镜具有不同的局限性。光学显微镜使得难以解决越来越小的特征，电子显微镜可以解决小结构，但是必须精心准备样品，杀死任何活样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/high-speed-in-shim-in-line-force-mappe-mapping-unveils-e-coli-coli-cell-cell-division-dremics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/high-speed-in--in-line-force-mappe-mapping-unveils-e-coli-coli-cell-cell-division-division-dynamics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79484755-A33D-4013-AB88-F0E4444F91EF21 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:21:37 -0500 High-speed in-line force mapping unveils E. coli cell division dynamics
遗传易感性在咖啡如何比其他人的味道苦味中发挥作用为什么咖啡对某些人的味道比对其他人的苦味更苦？慕尼黑技术大学莱布尼兹食品系统生物学研究所的研究人员现已接近回答这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/genetic-predisposition-plays-a-a--a--in-how-coffee-tastes-tastes-bitter-bitter-bitter-to----------- to-some-more-more-hothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/genetic-predisposition-plays-a-a--a--in-how-coffee-tastes-tastes-bitter-bitter-bitter-to--------------- to-some-more-more-hothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=707EC208-D528-4E51-AB61-61-61-90FB1145C014 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:14:54 -0500 Genetic predisposition plays a role in how coffee tastes bitter to some more than others
调查显示，更多的美国人准备在心脏紧急情况下进行心肺复苏术当某人的心脏停止抽水时，早期的CPR可以挽救他们的生命。美国心脏协会的新调查研究表明，越来越多的美国人准备为他们的朋友，家人和社区提供救生节奏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-shows-shows-more-mericans-preparedto-performe-perform-cpr-cpr-in-cpr-in-cardiac-emergencies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-shows-shows-more-mericans-to-performed to-perforn-cpr-cpr-in-cardiac-emergencies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbc0b7c5-0a78-453a-8980-70fb10843304 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 21:08:36 -0500 Survey shows more Americans prepared to perform CPR in cardiac emergencies

榨汁对您的肠道有益吗？研究显示了令人惊讶的微生物组变化短期水果和蔬菜榨汁会导致口腔和肠道微生物组的微生物变化，但是这些变化主要是短暂的，并在14天后恢复到基线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/is-juicing-good-for-for-for-your-gut-research-shows-shows-shows-nows-corprising-microbiome-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/is-juicing-good-for-for-for-your-gut-research-shows-shows-shows-shows-nows-corprising-microbiome-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbc31d94-d874-4fb4-bf38-38-3c544410c5eff Wed, 29 Jan 2025 20:59:00 -0500 Is juicing good for your gut?
